thread.title: Intex Aqua Young 4G with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 2,800mAh battery launched for Rs 5,549
thread.title_full: Intex Aqua Young 4G with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 2,800mAh battery launched for Rs 5,549

title: Intex Aqua Young 4G with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 2,800mAh battery launched for Rs 5,549
text:
Intex Aqua Young 4G with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 2,800mAh battery launched... Intex Aqua Young 4G with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 2,800mAh battery launched for Rs 5,549 By February 2, 2017 “The Aqua Young 4G is an entry-level VoLTE-enabled offering powered by Marshmallow” 
Earlier this week, Intex launched the Aqua Amaze+ , a VoLTE-enabled budget offering. Now the company has added yet another entry-level smartphone called the Aqua Young 4G. The phone comes as a 4G-enabled, upgraded variant of the Aqua Young , which was launched in 2015. 
As for the specs, the Intex Aqua Young 4G offers a 5-inch display bearing a resolution of 480 x 854 pixels. The phone is powered by a 1.1GHz quad-core MediaTek MT6737M processor, mated to Mali T720-MP1 graphics and 1GB of RAM. The storage on board is 8GB, which can be further increased by inserting a microSD card. 
The Aqua Young 4G offers a 5-megapixel autofocus primary snapper with an LED flash and f/2.4 aperture, and a 5-megapixel fixed-focus secondary shooter on the front. In terms of connectivity, it offers 4G with VoLTE, dual-SIM slots, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and GPS. A 2,800mAh battery keeps the phone running. Software-wise, it boots Android 6.0 Marshmallow. 
The Intex Aqua Young 4G has been priced at Rs 5,549, and comes in Champagne and Blue hues. The phone is listed on the company’s website, and is expected to go on sale via major brick-and-mortar stores soon. Facebook Comments
